name: XIII
description: Updated installer for the re-released (NOT remake) GOG version @Dec 2019.
notes:
- Ignore error messages during installation, press exit after the gog setup installs.
- For HD resolutions have a look here: http://pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/XIII#Widescreen_resolution
- Some settings in the option menus hard crash the game, edit the game options through xIII.ini and DefUser.ini

files.game: N/A:Please select Windows installer provided by GOG

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select Windows installer provided by GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/XIII/system/XIII.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing XIII
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: sandbox
    description: Disabling unused WINE features
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
